articles.title: ICICI Bank revises fixed deposit (FD) interest rates: Check latest rates here - Economic Times
articles.description: ICICI Bank is offering a 5.60 percent interest rate on FDs maturing in 5 years 1 day up to 10 years. It is also offering 5.45 percent for a five-year FD, on which tax benefit is available under Section 80C of the Income-Tax Act, 1961.
articles.content: After HDFC Bank, SBI, and Canara Bank, ICICI Bank has now followed suit and revised the interest rates on its fixed deposits. The new FD interest rates will be effective from January 20, 2022.Accordi… [+3910 chars]

articles.title: Tim Cook and Sundar Pichai are personally lobbying senators against antitrust legislation: report - The Verge
articles.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai have been personally “calling and meeting with senators,” urging them to oppose the mooted antitrust legislation. The bipartisan bill aims to rein in Big Tech’s control of online markets.
articles.content:

articles.title: CESL floats tender for 5580 e-buses under Grand Challenge for 5 cities - ETAuto.com
articles.description: Through this Grand Challenge, CESL aims to deploy 5450 single decker buses and 130 double decker buses. The cities to be covered under this “Grand Challenge” are Bengaluru, Delhi, Surat, Hyderabad, and Kolkata in the first phase, CESL said.
articles.content: This is the biggest ever scheme in the world and is based on an innovative, asset-light model that makes it possible for STUs to deploy affordably and at scale," Mahua Acharya, MD & CEO, CESL, sa… [+3813 chars]
